item.title: Conversational AI: Building Low-Latency voicebots
item.description: Large Language Models have recently demonstrated impressive conversational capabilities, the newer variants of Generative Pretrained Transformers such as GPT-4o from OpenAI is has been optimized for conversations, Core Components
